jetpack-related-posts.title: Q4 2019 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 2019 was an important and transformative year for AqualisBraemar. The acquisition of Braemar Technical Services roughly doubled the size of the company and improved our offering to our clients, who now benefit from a broader suite of services and increased geographical footprint.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Financial calendar for Aqualis ASA
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: FINANCIAL YEAR 2018  28.02.2019 - Quarterly Report - Q4 12.04.2019 - Annual Report FINANCIAL YEAR 2019 30.07.2019 - Half-yearly Report 13.05.2019 - Annual General Meeting 25.04.2019 - Quarterly Report - Q1 24.10.2019 - Quarterly Report - Q3   The dates are subject to change For further information, please contact: Kim…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Invitation to presentation of Q4 2019 results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA ("AqualisBraemar") will release its fourth quarter 2019 results on Thursday, February 27, 2020 at approximately 07:00 am Central European Time (CET).

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar supports UN Global Compact
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: By signalling this intent, AqualisBraemar commits to making the UN Global Compact, and its principles, part of the strategy, culture and day-to-day operations of the company, and to engage in collaborative projects which advance the broader development goals of the United Nations, particularly its sustainable development goals.
